events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the value changes.
events.description_zh: 值更改时调用的处理程序。

orientation.description: The axis the checkbox group items should align with.
orientation.description_zh: 复选框组项目应与的轴对齐。

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

radius.type: none / base / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / full

name.description: The name of the CheckboxGroup, used when submitting an HTML form.
name.description_zh: 提交 HTML 表单时使用的 CheckboxGroup 的名称。

lineThrough.description: Whether the checkboxes label should be crossed out.
lineThrough.description_zh: 是否应划掉复选框标签。

defaultValue.description_zh: 默认的选定值。（不受控制）。

isInvalid.description: Whether the checkbox group is invalid.

validationState.description: Whether the inputs should display its "valid" or "invalid" visual styling. (**Deprecated**) use **isInvalid** instead.
validationState.description_zh: 输入是否应显示其“有效”或“无效”的视觉样式。（**已弃用**）请改用 **isInvalid**。

isDisabled.description: Whether the checkbox group is disabled.
isDisabled.description_zh: 复选框组是否处于禁用状态。

isRequired.description: Whether user checkboxes are required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在提交表单之前，输入是否需要用户复选框。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the checkboxes can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 复选框是否可以被选中，但不能由用户更改。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the animation should be disabled.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the checkbox group slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为复选框组插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Checkbox group root wrapper, it wraps the label and the wrapper.
slots.description_zh: 复选框组根包装器，它包装标签和包装器。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: Checkbox group wrapper, it wraps all checkboxes.
slots.description_zh: 复选框组包装器，它会包装所有复选框。

slots.name: label
slots.description: Checkbox group label, it is placed before the wrapper.
slots.description_zh: 复选框组标签，它被放置在包装器之前。

slots.name: description
slots.description: The description of the checkbox group.

slots.name: errorMessage
slots.description: The error message of the checkbox group.
